```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(hexbin)
```


```{r}
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_hex() +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "thistle", high = "purple4") +
  labs(y = "CalEnviroScreen 3.0 score",
       x = "Percent of Community that Identifies as White",
       caption = "This graph shows the relationship between a community's percentage of White residents and its CalEnviroScreen 3.0 Score"
       ) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
